column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I've wanted to go here for a good two years now
column2: and I just got around to doing so! I was NOT DISAPPOINTED! The cafe is super cute and parking is very easy to find (it's in Montrose
column3: everyone knows how difficult parking is in that area). I went for a late lunch with my friend
column4: and it was pretty packed! I got the common bond burger
column5: and she got the beef borguignon (I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS
column6: IT'S SO GOOD). After we ate
column7: we got some pastries to take home
column9: the pistachio croissant has to be
column11: the best croissant I've ever had. I am definitely coming back
